bibl.title: Tarsos, Aboukir, etc.: Before and After. Once Again.
bibl.note: Considers the third century AD gold medallions from Tarsos in Cilicia and Aboukir in Egypt, suggesting they served as donativa to high ranking officials not as 'prizes' to victors in games. Considers possible places of production, including Rome. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Ioannis Touratsoglou, Tarsos, Aboukir, etc.: Before and After. Once Again.

Considers the third century AD gold medallions from Tarsos in Cilicia and Aboukir in Egypt, suggesting they served as donativa to high ranking officials not as 'prizes' to victors in games. Considers possible places of production, including Rome. - Avec résumé en anglais.
